StorageEvent.summary:
The StorageEvent interface is implemented by the event, which is
sent to a window
when a storage area the window has access to is changed within the context of another document.

StorageEventStorageEvent.summary: The StorageEvent() constructor creates a new object.

StorageEventUrl.summary: The url property of the interface returns the URL of the document whose storage changed.
StorageEventUrl.value: A string containing the URL of the document whose storage changed.

StorageEventStorageArea.summary: The storageArea property of the interface returns the storage object that was affected.
StorageEventStorageArea.value: A object that represents the storage object that was affected.

StorageEventKey.summary: The key property of the interface returns the key for the storage item that was changed.
StorageEventKey.value: A string containing the key for the storage item that was changed.

StorageEventOldValue.summary: The oldValue property of the interface returns the original value of the storage item whose value changed.
StorageEventOldValue.value: A string containing the original value of the storage item.

StorageEventNewValue.summary: The newValue property of the interface returns the new value of the storage item whose value was changed.
StorageEventNewValue.value: A string containing the new value of the storage item.

StorageEventInitStorageEvent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The StorageEvent.initStorageEvent() method is used to initialize the value of a .
